TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnregisterInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains the information used to remove a registration entry from a peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Instances of this class are primarily used to pass registration removal request information to the resolver service from a network client of that service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string meshId, valuetype System.Guid registrationId) cil managed

Docs.param: <xref:System.String> that specifies the mesh ID of the peer whose entry is to be removed.
<xref:System.Guid> that uniquely identifies the entry to remove from the lookup table of the resolver service.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with mesh and registration ID of the peer to remove from the registration lookup table in the resolver service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool HasBody() cil managed

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the body of the message containing a serialized instance of this type is correctly formed.
Docs.returns: True if the registration removal information body is correctly-formed by the sender; false if it is not.

Docs.summary: Gets the mesh ID of the peer whose entry is to be removed.
Docs.value: <xref:System.String> that specifies the mesh ID of the peer whose entry is to be removed.

Docs.summary: Gets the unique ID of the entry to remove from the lookup table of the resolver service.
Docs.value: <xref:System.Guid> that uniquely identifies the entry to remove from the lookup table of the resolver service.
